synopsis.text: This is no ordinary girl, she's a legend on stage, undefeated and unyielding! Shen Dong, a former powerhouse of the sect, now seeks a tranquil existence, but his peace is shattered by the arrival of Xia Tian. This troublemaking girl may appear rebellious and wild, but beneath her tough exterior lies a heart full of warmth and kindness. As Shen Dong finds himself increasingly drawn to her, he realizes that her influence is changing him... Meanwhile, tensions among the four powerful sects continue to rise, and it's time to settle both old and new scores once and for all!
